Text:
Brilliant!  If there's some way you could get hold of the Atari2600 emulator, i'd be very grateful :)  

There's also a great Amiga emulator UAE4DROID , it's free on Android market for those interested in emulation.

Thanks again Thug~
i haven seen an Atari2600 emulator but if you find one, give me its name and il dig around for it

The Atari2600 emulator is called Droid2600. It's only new.  You can see it on the Android market.

Thanks for all your other stuff also :)
do u need qwerty keyboard or so to use this emulators, or can I just use my screen and maybe volume/home/back/menu buttons ? Im using Galaxy S.
Are these full version or lite?

I don't know if you're still on here, But how do i get this to work? I downloaded a gba_bios.bin file to use as a bios, but just when i select a rom, it won't load it, but it will still be running on my phone.

I'm having the exact same issue as caimstear. Is Gameboid possibly corrupt? I've tried two bio's and three different roms (all pokemon ones :P) and it seems to try and start the game, and then closes it immediately.

Gbcoid however works like a charm. Thanks for the torrent.
